mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_ALERT ( ID, ALERT_TYPE, ALERT_MESSAGE, ALERT_PARAM, RECEIVER_MEMBER_ID, SENDER_MEMBER_ID ) VALUES ( SEQ_ALERT.NEXTVAL, #{alertType}, #{alertMessage}, #{alertParam}, #{receiverMemberId}, #{senderMemberId} )
mapper.select:
SELECT ID, ALERT_TYPE, ALERT_MESSAGE, ALERT_READ, ALERT_PARAM, ALERT_CREATE_TIME, RECEIVER_MEMBER_ID, SENDER_MEMBER_ID FROM TBL_ALERT WHERE RECEIVER_MEMBER_ID = #{receiverMemberId}
AND ALERT_TYPE = #{alertType}
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_ALERT SET ALERT_READ = 1 WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TBL_ALERT WHERE RECEIVER_MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} OR SENDER_MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
